entry.value: Sets the background color. By default this is blue.
Sets the background color. Set it to none.
Sets the main menu bar gradient. Change them all to one color or remove and set to background-color
Sets the main menu bar gradient. Change them all to one color or remove and set to background-color
Sets the main menu border color on the bottom. Set to 0 to remove;
Sets font size of the header of each page. 'Dashboard', 'Applications' ,etc.
Sets font weight of the header of each page. 'Dashboard', 'Applications' ,etc.
Sets text to uppercase lowercase or normal.. 'Dashboard', 'Applications' ,etc.
Sets color of the logged in as section. 'Edit my Preferences','logout', etc..
Sets color of the logged in as User Name
Sets font size of the edit preferences text and logout text
outline: none; font-family: "Helvetica Neue" !important; font-weight: lighter !important;
Sets the baseline font style. Add a font-family here to change it globally. Beware. if you set this, you may open Pandoras box with a lot of other configs that will be required
Sets color of the quicklink categories.
Sets color of the edit dashboard link on the dashboard
Sets font size of the quicklink categories
Sets font size of the quicklink categories
Sets the login image. this by default is 'identityIQ'
Sets font family of the quicklink categories
Sets uppercase or lowercase text formation of the quick link category
color: darkblue; font-family: "Helvetica Neue"; font-weight: lighter;
Sets font size of the quicklinks.
Sets font size of the text in the main menu items that are not selected or hovered over
Sets Font Family of the text in the main menu items that are not selected or hovered over
Sets text to either uppercase, lowercase, or none
Sets color of the text in the main menu when you are selecting it or hovering over it
Main Menu Selected Hover Backgound Color
Sets color of the background in the main menu when you are selecting it or hovering over it
Sets color of the text in the main menu items that are not selected or hovered over
Main Menu Selected Hover Background Color
Sets color of the background in the main menu items when they are not selected or hovered over
Sets color of the border around each sub menu item
Sets color of the border around each sub menu item
Sets text to uppercase or lowercase in the submenus
Sets color of the border around each sub menu item
Sets style of the border around each sub menu item inside the padding.
Sets radium of the border around each sub menu item inside the padding. A higher number rounds the corners more.
Sub Menu Selected Hover Text Color
Sets color of the text in the main menu when you are selecting it or hovering over it
Sub Menu Selected Hover Background Color
Sets color of the background in the sub menu near the text when you are selecting it or hovering over it
Sets color of the text in the sub menu items that are not selected or hovered over
Sets color of the background in the unselected sub menu items
Sets Color of the border around each sub menu item. this is inside the padding
Sets the login header color. this by default is blue
Sets color of the background in the sub menu items when they are not selected or hovered over
Sets color of the background of the active tab
Sets color of the text active tab
Sets color of the background of the inactive tab
Sets color of the text inactive tab
Sets background image of the text inactive tab. set to background-image:none; if you want the background color to show.
Sets the login image. this by default is 'identityIQ'
Sets the login Middle background color. this by default is white
Sets the login Text color. this by default is blue and says 'Welcome to IdentityIQ'
Sets the login Text font family. this by default is blue and says 'Welcome to IdentityIQ'
Sets color of the header of each page. 'Dashboard', 'Applications' ,etc.
Sets font family of the header of each page. 'Dashboard', 'Applications' ,etc.
Sets color of the logged in as section. 'Edit my Preferences','logout', etc..
Sets color of the '|' between the logged in as section. 'Edit my Preferences','logout', etc..

Sets font family login Text color. this by default is blue and says 'Welcome to IdentityIQ'
Sets color of the section sub-headers on the define objects pages. 'Schema==>Attributes' ,etc.
Sets font family of the section sub-headers of define objects page. 'Schema==>Attributes',etc.
Sets the font size of the content titles. Examples are the section headings on the define application screen.
Sets the font color of the content titles. Examples are the setion headings on the define application screen.
The page info class is the 'Below are listed the current application...' text when you click on the change password link. This is used on most pages to tell you what to do on the page.

Sets the font weight of the page info text. The page info class is the 'Below are listed the current application...' text when you click on the change password link. This is used on most pages to tell you what to do on the page.

Sets the font size of the page H3 info text. The page info class is the 'Below are listed the current application...' text when you click on the change password link. This is used on most pages to tell you what to do on the page.

Sets the font size of the page H$ info text. The page info class is the 'Below are listed the current application...' text when you click on the change password link. This is used on most pages to tell you what to do on the page.

Sets radium of the border around each sub menu item inside the padding. A higher number rounds the corners more.
